fields.name: Amphibious
fields.desc: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

fields.name: Mucous Cloud
fields.desc: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

fields.name: Probing Telepathy
fields.desc: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

fields.name: Tail
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft. one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
